TopicTitle: WASD controlls both separate ships on screen

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I seem to be having a problem. When I get two separate ships in docking range, turning one ship with WASD also turns the other ship. Meaning I can't dock because the other ship will always rotate away on its own. I don't have any mods installed.

Edit: The issue has been solved, here's the fix for anyone having this problem:

SOLVED

Unbelievable! I finally solved this riddle. Thanks sooo much for the save game.

I can say this is definitely a bug with 0.23.5 Stock, but there's a super easy fix. Press ALT-X, then switch to your other craft and press ALT-X again. This zeros out your trim.

Both of your craft in the save have trim input. Because the game now tracks control states, when you provide input to one craft, it overrides the SAS in the other craft. However, you aren't actually providing any input to the other craft, so the only input it gets is from it's trim state. If you zero out the trim, it's receiving zero input.

Here is the thread I posted in the bugs section: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/78005-Controlling-All-Craft-in-Physics-Range
